## Downloading R and RStudio

The first stage of working with R is to download and install R and RStudio.

* You can install R here: <https://cran.rstudio.com/>

* You can install RStudio here: <https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/>

To get more help downloading and installing R and RStudio, you can watch these videos:

* [for Windows](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eD07NznguA4)

* [for Mac](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AEebOXiMyyI)
